tasks.title: Map current inbound email workflow

tasks.title: Map v2 worker runtime architecture
tasks.notes: Identify the v2 runtime entrypoints, how workflow graphs are executed, and what assumptions (queues, DB, retries) it makes.

tasks.title: Identify server-action/request-flow alternatives
tasks.notes: Find the current request-flow patterns for similar async work and sketch how inbound email could run in normal server request flow (route handler/server action) without the worker.

tasks.notes: Merge findings into a concrete migration plan: code touchpoints, interfaces, rollout steps, and what to delete/disable so only v2 worker runtime remains.
